title: This Horror Game is Basically PS1 Resident Evil
description:
Crow Country is not for everyone, but if it sounds cool to you, BUY IT! 

From this episode of Kinda Funny Gamescast: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BNN_iQCsfKo 

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

FOLLOW US ON EVERYWHERE!
